name: Tiny Halloween Simulator *Game Jam Edition*
description:
Not able to go trick or treating this Halloween?

Don't fret! Tiny Halloween simulator is here to help

Features:
  • 3 whole houses to visit! 1 that you really shouldn't!
  • Walk right infinitely!
  • 4 hideous colors!
  • Candy!
Controls:

Z: Interact/Progress

X: Skip typing

C: Open menu. (Only works outside of textboxes.)

Up-Down Arrows: Choose.

Left-Right Arrows: Move.

Credits:

This game was made by me, but the textboxes used are heavily based off this tutorial.

This game uses these sounds from freesound:

"ResidentialFallNight_crickets.wav" by rambelr52 (https://freesound.org/people/rambler52/sounds/340326/) licensed under CCBY 3.0

Also:

I might update this game based on feedback. If you like it, please comment. I may add more to it. I have some ideas in mind already.
